roadmaps.title: SDE-1 (Software Development Engineer)
roadmaps.description: The definitive path to becoming a Software Development Engineer at top product-based companies.
steps: Master one programming language (C++/Java/Python)
Complete DSA Roadmap
Learn Core CS Subjects (OS, DBMS, CN)
Build 2-3 strong projects (e.g., E-commerce site, Web Scraper)
Learn System Design basics
Prepare your resume and practice mock interviews

roadmaps.title: Data Scientist
roadmaps.description: A step-by-step guide to landing a job in the exciting field of Data Science.
steps: Learn Python and its data science libraries (Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib)
Master Statistics and Probability
Understand Machine Learning algorithms (Supervised, Unsupervised)
Learn Deep Learning concepts (Neural Networks, TensorFlow/PyTorch)
Build a portfolio of data science projects
Learn SQL for data manipulation and querying

roadmaps.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
roadmaps.description: Your roadmap to becoming a defender of digital systems and networks.
steps: Build a strong foundation in Computer Networks and Operating Systems
Learn about common security principles and threats
Master at least one scripting language (Python is recommended)
Get hands-on with tools like Wireshark, Nmap, Metasploit
Study for certifications like CompTIA Security+ or CEH
Participate in Capture The Flag (CTF) competitions

roadmaps.title: UPSC Civil Services (IAS/IPS)
roadmaps.description: A comprehensive preparation strategy for one of the toughest exams in India.
steps: Thoroughly understand the exam pattern and syllabus
Build a strong foundation with NCERTs (Class 6-12)
Cover standard reference books for each subject (e.g., Laxmikanth for Polity)
Focus on daily current affairs and newspaper reading (The Hindu/Indian Express)
Practice answer writing for Mains and solve previous year papers
Regularly attempt mock tests for both Prelims and Mains

roadmaps.title: SSC CGL (Combined Graduate Level)
roadmaps.description: A focused plan to crack the SSC CGL exam for various Group 'B' and 'C' posts.
steps: Master the four sections: Quantitative Aptitude, Reasoning, English, General Awareness
Develop speed and accuracy in solving math problems
Improve vocabulary and grammar for the English section
Stay updated with static GK and current events for General Awareness
Solve a large number of previous year question papers
Take online mock tests to manage time effectively

roadmaps.title: Product Manager (Entry-Level)
roadmaps.description: A guide to breaking into the field of Product Management, a blend of tech, business, and user experience.
steps: Understand the role of a Product Manager and the product lifecycle
Develop business acumen and market analysis skills
Learn about UI/UX principles and user-centric design
Practice case studies (e.g., 'Improve product X', 'Design product Y')
Build a side project or gain experience through internships
Network with existing Product Managers
